name: The Lottery
description:
Congratulations! You have won the lottery! You have been chosen to defend your village from the endless army of rats. Collect resources such as rocks and trees in the gather phase with the hero, and build towers with the carpenter in the defense phase. Beat 4 levels to win the game!

Hero Controls:

AWSD / Arrow Keys - Move

Left Click - Mine Resources

Carpenter Controls:

AWSD / Arrow Keys - Move

1/2/3/4/5 - Buy Towers

Left Click - Place Tower

Made by Colin Herbert, Dylan Etson, Noah Butler, and Evan Williams
